page.title: 04THE SILO UNIT,TWYFORD CONT.
page.content: (3)THE TENT LIKE STRUCTURES HAVE AN ESTIMATED LIFE OF 15 YRS AND CAN EASILY BE MOVED TO MEET THE NEEDS OF COUNTRIES WHOSE HARVEST ISN'T ALWAYS IN THE SAME PLACE.THE STORES ARE ROT PROOF AND PEST PROOF.THEY HAVE BEEN SENT TO ZAMBIA,THE YEMEN,SRI LANKA AND MOST LATIN AMERICAN COUNTRIES. {PUBLIC RELATIONS} THE COMPANY IS VERY CONCIOUS OF THE FACT THAT CHERCO PRODUCTION CAUSES WIND BORN POLLUTION AND UNPLEASANT SMELLS.THE COMPANY MAINTAINS A SMALL WEATHER STATION TO ANTICIPATE CONDITIONS WHICH MAY LEAD TO A NUISANCE BEING COMMITED IN NEARBY RESIDENTIAL AREAS. {AREA OF DISTRIBUTION} FROM CORNWALL TO SCOTLAND AND SOME TO THE OTHER COMPANY OWNED FACTORY IN DIEPPE. THE COMPANY HAS NO IMMEDIATE PLANS TO EXPAND OR ALTER ITS OPERATION.
